name: MJ2022 (Ghost Proof of Concept)
description:
This is my submission for Mini Jam "Ghosts" and "Shotgun"

This is also the first game I've written in C++.

Like my other jam entries, I was rushed due to work, so enjoy this work in progress/proof of concept game. 

WASD to move, run into things to interact, and any key to advance text.

Originally it would have been about a war between ghosts and demons wherein an actual shotgun would've been used, but it just wasn't meant to be i guess.

I didn't have enough time to test this on other machines so hopefully my first engine written in C++ works on the first try, haha.
